release_notes: Print to PDF, Print settings tab, DPI scaling, contact sheet path fix
changelog: NEW: Print to PDF - toolbar print button can save PDF to album folder + copy folder
NEW: Print Settings tab - dedicated tab for print templates, email, and PDF settings
NEW: Enable PDF toggle - persistent per-user setting with immediate save
NEW: PDF Copy Folder - optional secondary folder to copy generated PDFs
IMPROVED: DPI-scaled toolbar - buttons, spacing, and offsets scale with display DPI
IMPROVED: Room Captured dialog with image preview thumbnail
IMPROVED: Toolbar hides during Save Album As and Print dialogs
FIX: Contact sheet saves to album/XML directory instead of Program Files
FIX: Email template refresh uses GetScriptCommand for .exe/.py compatibility
FIX: GetPythonPath() call corrected from non-existent GetPythonExe()
